item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-10-13
item.description: ‘Unleashed’ Apple Event Focusing on New Macs to Take Place on October 18 (2 minute read) Apple will be holding its Unleashed event on October 18 at 10 am Pacific Time at the Steve Jobs Theater on the Apple Park campus in Cupertino.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-10-04
item.description: Coinbase Multi-Factor Authentication Hack Affects at Least 6,000 Customers (1 minute read) Between March and May this year, hackers used a flaw in Coinbase’s account recovery process to bypass SMS multi-factor authentication and transfer funds out of at least 6,000 customers' accounts.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-12-18
item.description: Coinbase files to go public confidentially and weâ€™re hyped (2 minute read) Coinbase has filed to go public, likely debuting in early 2021.
